title: The Purported Right to Abortion
description:
Dahlia Lithwick is joined by Mark Joseph Stern for an emergency reading of the jurisprudential tea leaves in the wake of the Supreme Court’s decisions regarding Texas’ abortion ban, under SB8. 
Podcast production by Sara Burningham.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:title: The Purported Right to Abortion
itunes:author: Slate Podcasts
itunes:subtitle: Texas’ bounty scheme worries the chief justice, but his conservative colleagues think it’s just fine.
